RFQForm.Technology: Click here to select the technology from the dropdown.
RFQForm.RFQNo: Click here to select the RFQ number from the dropdown.
RFQForm.PlantCode: Click here to select the plant code from the dropdown.
RFQForm.PartNo: Click here to select the part number from the dropdown.
RFQForm.RMName: Click here to select the raw material name from the dropdown.
RFQForm.RMGrade: Click here to select the raw material grade from the dropdown.
RFQForm.RMSpecification: Click here to select the raw material specification from the dropdown.
RFQForm.AddPart: Click here to add the part.
RFQForm.VendorCode: Click here to select the vendor code from the dropdown.
RFQForm.PointofContact: Click here to select whom you want to contact from the dropdown.
RFQForm.AddVendor: Click here to add the vendor.
RFQForm.VisibilityCheckbox: Check the box to select visibility mode.
RFQForm.VisibilityMode: Click here to select the preferred visibility mode.
RFQForm.save: Click here to save the data. Note that the quotation will not be sent to the vendor.
RFQForm.cancel: Click here to return to the RFQ page.
RFQForm.send: Click here to send the quotation to the vendor.

rfqView.ViewRfq: Click on the checkbox to compare the RFQs.
rfqView.ViewRfq_reset: Refresh the grid to update filtered data from here.
rfqView.ViewRfq_compare: Click on the checkbox of the part number to compare the RFQs.
rfqView.ViewRfq_back: Click here to return to the RFQ listing.
rfqView.ViewRfq_remarkHistory: Click here to view the remark history.
rfqView.ViewRfq_view: Click here to view the costing details.
